content.body: Hey, I just noticed that the spec text for resizable ArrayBuffers defines a host hook that defaults to *not* resizing the buffer, and the HTML spec was not updated to include an implementation
content.formatted_body: Hey, I just noticed that the spec text for resizable ArrayBuffers defines a host hook that defaults to not resizing the buffer, and the HTML spec was not updated to include an implementation

content.body: there was a PR to the HTML spec, but that only changed the structured cloning algorithm
I assume this is not intentional?
